name: @yasshi2525/poi-katsu
description: simulation game for Niconico nama game, gaining point by coupon related activities

scripts.build: rimraf ./script && tsc && akashic scan asset script
scripts.update: akashic scan asset && akashic scan globalScripts
scripts.export-zip: rimraf game.zip && akashic export zip -o game.zip --nicolive
scripts.export-html: rimraf game && akashic export html -o game

author: yasshi2525
